import React from 'react' import Square from './Square' function Board() { const [squares, setSquares] = React.useState(Array(9).fill(null)) const [isX, setIsX] = React.useState(true) const handleClick = (i) => { squares[i] = isX ? 'X' : 'O' // if(isX) x; else O; setSquares(squares) setIsX(!isX) } return (
handleClick(0)} /> handleClick(1)}/> handleClick(2)}/>
handleClick(3)}/> handleClick(4)}/> handleClick(5)}/>
handleClick(6)}/> handleClick(7)}/> handleClick(8)}/>
) } export default Board
